request.description: Generate job recommendations based on latest CV analysis and profile skills. Automatically triggered after CV analysis completes.

query.description: Filter by status: recommended, viewed, applied, dismissed

request.description: Get user's job recommendations with full job details
Get single recommendation with match score and criteria
Mark recommendation as viewed (status: recommended → viewed)
Dismiss a recommendation (removes from active list)
Get statistics: total recommendations, by status, average scores
Delete all recommendations for current user
Returns redirect URL for external application
Only works if status is 'pending'
View all applications for your job posting
Valid statuses: pending, under_review, accepted, rejected, interview_scheduled

item.name: User - Create & Manage Tickets Copy

request.description:
✉️ **Emails Sent:**
1. User confirmation
2. Notification to all agents (Sarah, Mike, Emma)

📋 **Ticket Status:** open → pending_assignment
Create ticket from different user
Get all tickets created by current user
Shows ticket + all messages (cached)

exec: console.log('📧 Email sent to assigned agent(s)');

request.description: ✉️ Sends email to assigned agent(s)

formdata.value: Here's a screenshot of the error message I'm getting

formdata.description: Select image or PDF (max 5 files, 10MB each)

request.description:
📎 Upload files with message
✉️ Email includes download links

⭐ **Rate Primary Agent (1-5 stars)**

✅ Updates agent's profile:
- Adds rating to agent.agentRatings[]
- Recalculates agent.averageRating
- Increments agent.totalRatings

⚠️ Can only rate resolved/closed tickets
⚠️ Can only rate once per ticket
Reopens closed ticket. Increments reopenedCount.

item.description: User ticket management and rating system

request.description: Shows tickets where this agent is in pendingAgents[] list

✅ **First agent to accept becomes PRIMARY**

📧 Email sent to customer:
"Agent Sarah has been assigned to your ticket"

📊 Status: pending_assignment → in_progress

👤 Agent added to assignedAgents[] with:
- status: 'accepted'
- role: 'primary'

exec: console.log('👥 Multiple agents on ticket now');

request.description:
✅ **Additional agents become COLLABORATORS**

👥 Allows multiple agents to work together

📊 Agent added to assignedAgents[] with:
- status: 'accepted'
- role: 'collaborator'

❌ Agent declines ticket

- Removed from pendingAgents[]
- Added to assignedAgents[] with status 'declined'
- No email sent

query.description: Search by ticket number or subject

request.description: View all tickets with filters

📊 Returns:
- Tickets by status
- Tickets by priority
- Tickets by category
- Avg response time
- Avg resolution time
- Avg rating
Update ticket properties (staff only)

🔒 Internal notes:
- NOT visible to customer
- NOT sent via email
- Only visible to staff
✉️ Sends email to customer with agent's reply

exec: console.log('📧 Email sent to customer with satisfaction survey');

request.description:
✅ Marks ticket as resolved

✉️ **Email sent to customer with:**
- Ticket summary
- Satisfaction survey (rate 1-5 stars)
- Option to reopen

📊 Calculates:
- resolutionTime
- Sets resolvedAt timestamp
Admin can manually assign without agent acceptance
Update multiple tickets at once
⚠️ Deletes ticket + all messages permanently

item.name: Agent Management & Ratings Copy

request.description:
📊 Shows all agents with:
- Total tickets assigned
- Open/In Progress/Resolved counts
- Average rating ⭐
- Total ratings received
Quick search by email/name (for assignment)

📊 **Complete Agent Profile:**

**Ticket Stats:**
- By status (open, in_progress, resolved)
- By priority (low, medium, high, urgent)
- By category
- Avg response time
- Avg resolution time

**⭐ Rating Stats:**
- Average rating (1-5)
- Total ratings received
- Breakdown (5⭐, 4⭐, 3⭐, 2⭐, 1⭐)
- Last 10 ratings with:
  - Rating value
  - Customer feedback
  - Ticket number
  - Date rated

**Recent Tickets:**
- Last 10 tickets handled

📝 **All Reviews for Agent:**

- Paginated list
- Filter by rating (1-5)
- Sorted by most recent
- Includes:
  - Rating (1-5 stars)
  - Customer feedback text
  - Ticket number & subject
  - Customer name
  - Date rated
Filter to show only 5-star reviews

🏆 **Performance Leaderboard**

**Sort by:**
- rating: Average rating (best rated agents)
- resolved: Most tickets resolved
- response: Fastest response time
- total: Most tickets handled

**Period:**
- all: All time
- today: Last 24 hours
- week: Last 7 days
- month: Last 30 days
Most productive agents this week
Fastest responding agents
